title: Paying top dollar for  T206 American Beauty Baker and Jennings VG-VGEX
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Paying top dollar for  T206 American Beauty Baker and Jennings VG-VGEX
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I need a little help with a couple HOFer's with American Beauty (460 and 350 No Frame) backs.  I am looking for an American Beauty 460 and a 350 No Frame in VG or VGEX.  My two top targets would be Baker and Jennings, but will talk about any HOFer that you have.  I have a little bit of low grade trading stock and/or purchase money.



Thanks for the help,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
are you trading anything for these cards?
